entry.title: Decidedly So
entry.content:
Another drink?!

“Decidedly so”, said the oscelot though his tuxedo was a mess. “Without a doubt this round-a-bout caused the vomit on our dress!”

“Was more than that, not tit-for-tat!”, said the lion to his mistress, “That lush oh he’d been drinkin see, We partied late this Christmas!”

It all began in north Japan, the saki bombs were flowing, then on the streets, a cab with beats, not knowing where they’re going.

The group of four had asked for more, this night they would remember “We’re having so much fun tonight!” A jolly drunk December
entry.summary: "Decidedly so", said the oscelot though his tuxedo was a mess.

entry.title: There once was…
entry.content:
There once was…

There once was a man from Kalamazoo
a dirty mind, why look at you?
For did you think this poem was dirty?
How old are we now? 20 - 30?

No age restriction on rhyme or diction
it helps the mind to wander
a stinking pile of cow manure
have we now filled expectations?

Expectations do not help
except in suffering
life will never fulfill your dreams
but will always keep you guessing.

Guessing is a game we play
when trying to pass some time
at work, at home, love-life, alone
fruitless as it may.

entry.title: Deliberately
entry.content:
Deliberately

Deliberately meticulous
Deliberately hideous
venomous anger, seething rage

Deliberately handsome
make some, checksum
this porridge is too cold.

Deliberately fat
Deliberately stoned
successful or a waste?

I once made waffles
from kidney beans
I did it so deliberately.

entry.title: Oswald Cobblepot
entry.content:
Oswald Cobblepot

Oswald Cobblepot, you fat little thing,
Batman was the best.
Cut an eye, pie in the sky,
Saw a rocket test!

Ruby red flower bed,
kisses on the forehead,
full of dread, Knox in bed
mice eating purple cheese.

Purple cheese? What are these?
Tulips? Should we tip toe?

Windowsill, breathing gill,
lying still, take the pill,
up the hill, lost my will,
black and white mostaccioli.
entry.summary: Oswald Coblepot, you fat little thing, Batman was the best
